name: Primary Maths
overview: Educational game has 4 Sub Games, Subtraction Tutor 1 & 2 + Addition Tutor 1 & 2. Number 2 in a series for ages 5-7. Get off to a good start in school with the four maths programmes in this tutor series. Graphic instructional methods with drill and practice follow-up prevail in this tutorial of simple addition with carry, simple subtraction, and subtraction with borrowing.
